questions.question: What was the average price of pound of coffee beans in October 2019?

components.taskName: Filter the data to include only the data points from October 2019.
Retrieve the price of coffee beans in October 2019 from the filtered data.

questions.question: What was the range of average price of pound of coffee beans from October 2018 to October 2019?

components.taskName: Filter the data to the data point from October 2018.
Filter the data to the data point from October 2019.
Determine the range on the X axis between October 2018 and October 2019.
Filter the data to include data points within the determined date range.
Find the maximum coffee price within the filtered date range.
Find the minimum coffee price within the filtered date range.
Determine the price range by using the minimum and maximum price identified.

questions.question: When was the average price of a pound of coffee beans at maximum?

components.taskName: Identify the highest price point on the y-axis (Coffee Price).
Map the maximum price point to the corresponding date on the x-axis.
